title: Black screen on Champion loading screen
body:
Whenever I try playing a lol game, I head into Champion select which works smoothly but when it gets to the champion loading screen. It just becomes a black screen, when i click it, I am forced to close it and when I get to the reconnect screen, I try reconnecting and same thing happens. plz fix this 
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
The problem might be fixable on your end. What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

Have you tried looking over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)?
